class.name: prx_planning/rearrangement_manipulation_tp
class.description: A task planner for a simple rearrangement manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/preprocess_manipulation_tp
class.description: A task planner for running offline and build the informed graph for the rearrangement problem.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulator_tp
class.description: A task planner for the manipulator task planner with extra information.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_mp
class.description: A motion planner for informing the graph for the rearrangment problem.

class.name: prx_planning/rearrangement_manipulation_specification
class.description: The problem specification for the rearrangement manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulator_specification
class.description: The problem specification for the manipulator motion planner.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_mp_specification
class.description: The problem specification for the manipulation motion planner.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulator_query
class.description: The query for the manipulator task planner inside the rearrangement problem.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulator_mp_query
class.description: The query for the manipulator motion planner inside the rearrangement problem.

class.name: prx_planning/obstacle_aware_astar
class.description: A special A* for the rearrangement manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/super_graph_astar
class.description: A special A* for the super graph in the rearrangement manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/system_name_validity_checker
class.description: A validity checker for the obstacle aware A*.
